team.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
team.bio: With over 15 years of experience in innovation and research, Dr. Chen leads our strategic initiatives.

team.name: Michael Rodriguez
team.bio: Michael brings extensive expertise in emerging technologies and research methodologies.

team.name: Dr. Emily Thompson
team.bio: Emily specializes in fostering creativity and driving innovative solutions across projects.

history.title: Foundation
history.description: Establishment of Innovation Lab with a vision to foster technological advancement and research excellence.

history.title: IIC Quest
history.description: IIC Quest 1.0 was a four-day pioneering initiative that brought together industry experts, students, and faculty members from both BIT and BBA programs. The event featured a comprehensive journey from bootcamp to pitch-day hackathon, with insightful sessions and seminars led by industry leaders.

history.title: IIC Quest 2.0
history.description: IIC Quest 2.0 was a three-day program featuring a 36-hour intensive hackathon with participation from various colleges across the Purwanchal region of Nepal. The event also included a Job Fair, where more than ten renowned companies from across Nepal sought to recruit talented students and graduates, and a Final Year Project Showcase, providing students with the opportunity to present their projects to potential employers.

facilities.name: Research Labs
facilities.description: State-of-the-art laboratories equipped with the latest technology for conducting advanced research.

facilities.name: Innovation Hub
facilities.description: A collaborative space designed for brainstorming, prototyping, and developing innovative solutions.

facilities.name: Digital Studio
facilities.description: Advanced digital equipment and software for multimedia content creation and virtual reality development.

achievements.title: ACES Techfest 7.0 Datathon Winner
achievements.description: Members from the Innovation Lab team won the ACES Techfest 7.0 Datathon, showcasing their innovative analysis of real-world datasets and their solutions.

achievements.title: ACES Techfest 7.0 UI/UX Winner
achievements.description: A member from our team demonstrated exceptional creativity and user-centered design thinking and won the UI/UX competition at ACES Techfest 7.0.

achievements.title: X-Hack 3.0
achievements.description: Team members developed Swastha Sahayog, a comprehensive healthcare platform integrating appointment booking, consultations, and community features.

faqs.question: What is Innovation Lab?
faqs.answer: Innovation Lab is a collaborative research and development space where students, faculty, and industry partners come together to work on cutting-edge projects and innovative solutions.

faqs.question: How can I get involved?
faqs.answer: There are multiple ways to get involved: join our research programs, attend workshops and events, apply for internships, or collaborate on projects. Check our Programs page for more details.

faqs.question: Do you offer mentorship programs?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer various mentorship programs connecting students and early-career professionals with experienced industry experts and researchers.

faqs.question: What facilities are available?
faqs.answer: Our facilities include state-of-the-art research labs, prototyping workshops, collaboration spaces, and advanced computing resources.
